title: [1.13.2] Rift 简单整合|Optifine|小地图|血量/状态/耐久显示|REI|村民交易|Litema...
author: phoenixlzx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 phoenixlzx 于 2019-1-17 00:59 编辑 

看来论坛丢了数据只好重发了。

午休吃饭的时候瞎糊出来的整合包。Minecraft 1.13.2 Rift Modpack
2019.1.16

APIRift forked by Chocoheadhttps://github.com/Chocohead/Rift
Mods/模组自动重连 Autoreconnector https://bbs.craft.moe/d/712血量显示（宝蓝重制版）Neat for Rift Remake https://bbs.craft.moe/d/671禁用自动更新 Non Update https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/non-update小地图 Voxel Map https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/voxelmap装备耐久显示 Giselbaer's Durability Viewer https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/giselbaers-durability-viewer前置库 MaLiLib https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/malilib加载模组列表 Rift Mod List https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/rift-mod-listREI 物品边栏 Roughly Enough Items https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/roughly-enough-itemsSchematic 管理和影印 Litematica https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/litematica村喵交易列表 EasierVillagerTrading https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/easiervillagertrading

Shaders/光影包Life NexusKuda ShadersAirLoocke ShaderBSLChocapic13ContinuumCYBOXshadersEbin ShadersOnlyWaterRudoPlays ShaderSEUSSildurs Vibrant Shaders

BUGs/这里是今天份的miu姐姐[已修复/FIXED] Crashing on Tab https://github.com/gbl/EasierVillagerTrading/issues/7
Do not press Tab in the beginning of chat area. 不要在聊天框无内容的情况下敲 Tab。REI displays on Villager Trading
Press O to toggle hide/display 如果 REI 盖住了村民交易列表，按 O 切换显示/隐藏。
Usage/Windows 食用指南从这里 https://minecraft.net/download/ 下载 Minecraft 启动器，或双击打开整合包内的 MinecraftInstaller.msi 启动安装。打开文件管理器，在地址栏输入 %appdata% 并按下回车键(Enter)。将整合包内的 .minecraft 目录移动到这里。如果出现任何冲突，选择覆盖所有（你应当已经做好备份）启动 Minecraft，登陆正版帐号，选择 Rift 配置文件享受游戏

键位调整：Focus/Zoom 放大 -> V 键全屏地图按键 M 与 Litematica 的菜单组合键 (C + M) 冲突，如果希望使用 Litematica 请 unset M 按键。

Download/下载地址百度云 https://pan.baidu.com/s/1LVAKx4NwZLyHPYC1zYvrGg提取码 86dxSHA-1 28f7b26bf7ec9b812b128dcfe4ee4f2562e59bed
预览图
